q: ( 03.02.11) that she and partner href="http://www.femalefirst.co.uk/dj/" title="Lastest DJ news from Female First"> DJ Darren Emerson split some time ago, but have remained close in order to protect their two-year-old son Ben. She said: As you ladies are aware I separated from Darren Emerson some time ago and we have worked through this together. We have come to terms with it now and are now able to speak about it. Every relationship where a child is involved is born out of love. There is a little boy in the middle and he has to come first. There is an overwhelming emotion of sadness but it doesn't make me want to scream and shout. It makes me want to learn from it. " I wouldn't watch the show now because it would be like seeing your ex-boyfriend with his new girlfriend. " Kate Thornton and Darren Emerson started dating in 2004 and got engaged in 2007.
